metadata.data_freshness: Data sourced from IRDAI FY 2024-25 disclosures, insurer websites, PolicyBazaar, Beshak.org, Ditto, and other aggregators. Last verified February 2026.
metadata.disclaimer: Information compiled from public sources. Premiums are NOT included (to be sourced separately via premium calculators). Coverage features are based on standard plan variants with ₹10 Lakh sum insured unless noted. Always verify with official policy documents before purchase.
metadata.gst_note: As of September 22, 2025, health insurance premiums in India are exempt from GST (previously 18%).

insurers.insurer_name: Star Health and Allied Insurance Co. Ltd.

claim_settlement_ratio.source: IRDAI Annual Report, Ditto analysis, PolicyX
claim_settlement_ratio.note: Star Health under IRDAI scrutiny for claim settlement practices as of March 2025. Self-reported CSR differs significantly from independent analysis. Highest complaint volume among standalone health insurers (52 complaints per 10,000 claims).

plans.description: Feature-rich comprehensive plan covering hospitalization, maternity, OPD, bariatric surgery, and modern treatments. Offers PED buyback rider to reduce waiting period from 36 to 12 months.

coverage_static.room_rent_limit: Single Private AC Room (Any room except Suite with Extra Protect add-on for SI > ₹20L)
coverage_static.co_payment: Nil up to age 60; 10% co-payment after age 60
coverage_static.disease_sublimits: Bariatric surgery limited to ₹2.5L-₹5L depending on SI. Maternity has specific sub-limits.
coverage_static.no_claim_bonus: 50% of basic SI per claim-free year, max 100% of SI. For SI ≥ ₹7.5L, 100% NCB in first claim-free year itself.
coverage_static.restoration_benefit: Yes - 100% automatic restoration once per policy year, usable for same or different illness
coverage_static.ambulance_coverage: Road: As per actuals; Air ambulance: Up to ₹2,50,000 per hospitalization (max ₹5,00,000 per policy year)
coverage_static.health_checkups: Free health check-up every claim-free year
coverage_static.maternity_coverage: Yes - Normal delivery ₹15,000-₹50,000; C-section ₹20,000-₹75,000 (varies by SI). Newborn covered up to ₹1L for 90 days.
coverage_static.opd_coverage: Yes - Outpatient consultation and dental/ophthalmic treatment covered up to limits

waiting_periods.notes: PED Buyback rider available at additional premium to reduce PED waiting from 36 months to 12 months. This is one of the shortest PED options in the market.

exclusions: War and nuclear weapon related injuries
Treatment for obesity (except bariatric surgery after waiting)
key_features: Hospital daily cash benefit up to 7 days (₹500/day)

plans.description: Premium flagship plan with age-lock feature (premiums based on entry age until claim), no room rent capping, worldwide coverage option, and sum insured options up to ₹1 Crore including unlimited SI.

coverage_static.no_claim_bonus: 50% per claim-free year, max 100% of SI (Super Star Bonus)
coverage_static.restoration_benefit: Yes - automatic restoration for related and unrelated illnesses throughout policy year
coverage_static.ayush_coverage: Yes, covered up to SI in recognized AYUSH hospitals
coverage_static.health_checkups: Annual health check-up up to 1% of SI (max ₹25,000) from Day 1, includes vaccination expenses
coverage_static.maternity_coverage: Optional cover - up to 4 deliveries. Waiting periods waived for newly added spouse.
coverage_static.opd_coverage: Not in base; available via add-on
coverage_static.medical_equipment_coverage: Up to ₹5L once in lifetime for prescribed medical equipment

waiting_periods.notes: Unique 'Lock the Clock' feature - premiums stay at entry age until claim is made or age 55. PED reduction from 36 to 24/12 months available. Limitless Care feature: one claim in lifetime covered without SI limits.

exclusions: Super Star Bonus and Limitless Care not applicable if Unlimited SI opted
key_features: Age-lock premium (Lock the Clock) until age 55 or first claim
Limitless Care - one unlimited claim in lifetime

plans.description: Mid-range plan with good coverage options from ₹5L to ₹2Cr. Room rent has sub-limits at lower SI. Suitable for budget-conscious buyers wanting basic comprehensive cover.

coverage_static.room_rent_limit: 1% of SI for ₹5L SI; Single Private AC Room for higher SI options
coverage_static.icu_rent_limit: 2% of SI for ₹5L; no limit for higher SI
coverage_static.co_payment: Nil (up to age 60); 10-20% co-pay may apply for senior citizens
coverage_static.no_claim_bonus: Up to 100% of SI for claim-free years

waiting_periods.notes: Standard waiting periods. No PED buyback option available unlike Comprehensive and Super Star.

insurers.insurer_name: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company Ltd.

claim_settlement_ratio.complaint_volume: 7 complaints per 10,000 claims (well below industry avg of 22)
claim_settlement_ratio.note: Consistently one of the most reliable insurers. Low complaint volume is a standout metric.

plans.description: Flagship plan offering 2X coverage from Day 1 (Secure Benefit), 4X total coverage over 2 years, no room rent limits, no disease sub-limits. Ranked #2 in Mint Beshak Insurance Ratings.

coverage_static.room_rent_limit: No limit - any room including Suite
coverage_static.disease_sublimits: None - cataract, joint replacement all covered at full SI
coverage_static.secure_benefit: 2X base cover from Day 1 (e.g., ₹10L policy = ₹20L cover instantly)
coverage_static.plus_benefit: Base cover increases by 50% after Year 1, 100% after Year 2 - regardless of claims
coverage_static.restoration_benefit: 100% restoration once per year (Unlimited Restore available as add-on)
modern_treatments: All modern treatments covered up to SI
coverage_static.ambulance_coverage: Up to ₹2,000 for individual; ₹5,000 for family floater per continuous renewal
coverage_static.consumables_coverage: 68 listed non-medical/consumable items covered at no extra premium (Protection Benefit)
coverage_static.maternity_coverage: Not in base plan. Available as add-on: ₹50,000 - ₹2,00,000 after 2-year waiting period.
coverage_static.opd_coverage: Not in base plan; available via add-on

waiting_periods.ped_buyback_reduced_to_months: 12 or 24 months (add-on not live yet as of Jan 2026)
waiting_periods.abcd_chronic_care_rider: Reduces waiting for Asthma, Blood pressure, Cholesterol, Diabetes to 30 days
waiting_periods.notes: ABCD Chronic Care Rider is a unique industry feature - covers 4 lifestyle diseases from Day 31. Standard PED buyback add-on in development.

key_features: 4X total coverage in 2 years (Secure + Plus benefit)
No room rent or disease sub-limits
68 consumable items covered in base plan
ABCD Chronic Care Rider (lifestyle diseases from Day 31)
Aggregate deductible option (up to 50% premium discount)
Loyalty discount for existing HDFC ERGO customers (2.5%)

insurers.insurer_name: ICICI Lombard General Insurance Co. Ltd.

claim_settlement_ratio.note: One of India's largest private general insurers. Quick claim approvals - initial cashless within 1 hour, final approval within 3 hours of discharge.

plans.description: Comprehensive health plan available in multiple variants (Health Shield, iHealth). No room rent capping, no co-pay, covers pre-existing diseases after 24 months. Good option with maternity and OPD add-ons.

coverage_static.disease_sublimits: Cataract: ₹1L per eye per policy year; Joint replacement: up to SI
coverage_static.no_claim_bonus: Varies by variant. Health Shield: cumulative bonus applicable
coverage_static.restoration_benefit: Yes - for unrelated illnesses. Unlimited times per policy year for subsequent claims (Health Shield variant)

waiting_periods.notes: One of the shorter PED waiting periods at 24 months (vs. industry standard 36-48 months). Lifelong renewability with entry age up to 65.

key_features: No room rent or co-payment restrictions

plans.description: Next-generation premium plan with JumpStart benefit (lifestyle disease PED reduced to 30 days), unlimited sum insured option, Infinite Care benefit (one unlimited claim in policy lifetime), and Power Booster for 100% annual SI increase.

coverage_static.room_rent_limit: Varies by variant - Twin sharing or No limit (Room Modifier add-on available)
coverage_static.co_payment: Nil (PPN discount available - 10% premium discount if treated at Preferred Provider Network hospitals)
coverage_static.no_claim_bonus: Guaranteed cumulative bonus of 20% per year up to 100% (Infinite Super Loyalty Bonus - even after claims)
coverage_static.restoration_benefit: 100% Reset - unlimited times per year from 2nd claim onwards (Infinite Reset)
coverage_static.daycare_procedures: All daycare procedures; 2-hour hospitalization also covered
coverage_static.ambulance_coverage: Road ambulance; Domestic Air Ambulance add-on available
coverage_static.health_checkups: Wellness services included (health assistance team, ambulance assistance)
coverage_static.maternity_coverage: Covered in base plan with sub-limits. Maternity waiting period reduction add-on available (2 years to 1 year).
coverage_static.surrogacy_coverage: Up to ₹5L for surrogate mother and oocyte donor expenses

waiting_periods.jumpstart_benefit: Reduces PED waiting for Asthma, Diabetes, Hypertension, Obesity, Coronary Artery Disease, Hyperlipidemia to 30 days (must be opted for 3 consecutive years)
waiting_periods.notes: JumpStart is a game-changer for lifestyle diseases. CIBIL score discount available for good credit scores.

key_features: JumpStart - lifestyle disease PED to 30 days
Infinite Care - one unlimited claim in lifetime
Infinite Reset - unlimited SI restoration from 2nd claim
Infinite Super Loyalty Bonus - NCB never reduces even after claims
Power Booster - 100% SI increase annually without cap
BeFit wellness program (up to 30% renewal discount)

insurers.insurer_name: Niva Bupa Health Insurance Co. Ltd.

claim_settlement_ratio.note: 100% claims settled within 3 months as per IRDAI. Known for 30-minute cashless claim processing. Product innovator in the market.

plans.description: Flagship comprehensive plan with unlimited reinstatement (ReAssure Forever), Booster+ (unused SI carries forward up to 10x), Lock the Clock, and up to 30% wellness discount. ReAssure 3.0 (latest) has 4 variants: Classic, Select, Elite, Black.

coverage_static.room_rent_limit: No limit - any room without capping (including ICU)
coverage_static.co_payment: Nil (co-payment applies if treated outside suggested hospital network in ReAssure 3.0 Concierge benefit)
coverage_static.disease_sublimits: None for most treatments. Cataract may have sub-limits in lower variants.
coverage_static.no_claim_bonus: Booster+ benefit - unused SI carries forward up to 10x of base cover over years
coverage_static.restoration_benefit: Unlimited reinstatement of base SI within policy year (ReAssure Forever - triggers after first paid claim, stays forever)
coverage_static.ayush_coverage: Yes, covered in recognized AYUSH hospitals (24-hour stay for AYUSH; 2-hour for regular treatments in 3.0)
modern_treatments: Stem cell therapy / bone marrow transplant
coverage_static.health_checkups: Annual health check-up from Day 1 of policy
coverage_static.consumables_coverage: Covered via Safeguard+ add-on (also includes inflation protection)
coverage_static.maternity_coverage: Available as optional cover in some variants
coverage_static.domiciliary_hospitalization: Covered up to SI (both cashless and reimbursement)
coverage_static.second_medical_opinion: Once annually for any condition requiring hospitalization

waiting_periods.ped_reduced_options_months: 12 or 24 months (depending on variant, at additional premium)
waiting_periods.specific_diseases_modification: Can be adjusted to 12 or 36 months in ReAssure 3.0
waiting_periods.notes: ReAssure 3.0 offers significant flexibility in waiting period customization. PED can be reduced to 12 months. Cancer from Day 31 in Black variant.

key_features: ReAssure Forever - unlimited SI reinstatement after first claim (lifetime feature)
Booster+ - unused SI accumulates up to 10x base cover
Lock the Clock - premiums at entry age until claim or specified age
Live Healthy - up to 30% renewal premium discount for fitness (step count based)
4 variants in 3.0: Classic, Select, Elite, Black
Surprise Benefit voucher on policy issuance (3.0)

claim_settlement_ratio.csr_percentage: 100% within 3 months (FY 2024-25 IRDAI for standalone health)
claim_settlement_ratio.note: High CSR but some complaints about claim-related issues. Low ICR indicates conservative claim payouts relative to premiums collected.

plans.description: Value-for-money comprehensive plan with no room rent/ICU sub-limits, unlimited automatic recharge, wellness rewards up to 30% discount, and Instant Cover add-on for lifestyle diseases from Day 31. Up to 7X coverage in 6 years via NCB Super.

coverage_static.room_rent_limit: No limit - any room category covered
coverage_static.disease_sublimits: None - all treatments covered at actuals up to SI
coverage_static.no_claim_bonus: 50% of SI per claim-free year, max 100% of SI. With NCB Super add-on: 100% per year up to 500% in 5 years.
coverage_static.restoration_benefit: Unlimited automatic recharge of SI - for same or different illness, unlimited times per policy year
coverage_static.ayush_coverage: Yes, in-patient AYUSH treatment covered up to SI
modern_treatments: All listed modern treatments up to SI
coverage_static.health_checkups: Optional add-on for annual preventive health check-up for all insured members
coverage_static.consumables_coverage: Claim Shield add-on covers 68 non-payable/consumable items
coverage_static.opd_coverage: Care OPD add-on: 4 GP + 4 specialist consultations per year (₹500/consultation reimbursement)
coverage_static.domiciliary_hospitalization: Covered for 3+ days when hospitalization not possible
coverage_static.mental_illness_coverage: Hospitalization covered in base plan. OPD mental health (depression, anxiety, PTSD, OCD) via Mental Well-being add-on.

waiting_periods.ped_reduction_add_on: PED Wait Period Modification add-on: reduces from 48 months to 12/24/36 months
waiting_periods.instant_cover_add_on: Reduces waiting for Diabetes, Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Asthma to 30 days
waiting_periods.notes: IMPORTANT: Care Supreme has 48-month (4-year) PED waiting - longer than industry standard of 36 months. However, Instant Cover add-on and PED modification add-ons can significantly reduce this.

exclusions: Pre-existing diseases until waiting period completion
Obesity treatment (unless bariatric surgery after waiting)
key_features: No room rent or disease sub-limits
Instant Cover add-on for 4 lifestyle diseases from Day 31
NCB Super add-on (up to 500% SI increase = 7X coverage in 6 years)
Live Healthy wellness rewards (up to 30% renewal discount)
Mental Well-being add-on for OPD mental health
Women Care add-on (mammography, PCOS tests, cervical cancer screening up to ₹50K/year)
Up to 6 members covered including parents-in-law, live-in/same-sex partners
Reasonably priced for the coverage offered

insurers.insurer_name: Aditya Birla Health Insurance Co. Ltd.
insurers.parent_company: Aditya Birla Capital Ltd. (45.89%) + Momentum Group South Africa (44.08%)

claim_settlement_ratio.csr_percentage: 100% within 3 months (FY 2024-25 IRDAI for standalone health)
claim_settlement_ratio.note: Newer entrant but rapidly growing. Strong wellness-linked insurance model. Moderate complaint volume - slightly higher than peers.

plans.description: Wellness-focused premium plan with HealthReturns™ (up to 100% premium cashback for staying healthy), Chronic Management Program from Day 1 for lifestyle diseases, and premium waiver on critical illness diagnosis. Available in Essential, Enhanced, and Premiere variants.

coverage_static.room_rent_limit: Enhanced variant: Single Private AC Room for SI up to ₹3L; Any room for SI ₹4L+. Premiere variant: No room rent limit at all.
coverage_static.co_payment: Essential variant: 20% co-payment (can be waived at extra premium). Enhanced/Premiere: Nil.
coverage_static.disease_sublimits: Enhanced: Cataract and joint replacement covered up to SI. Essential: May have sub-limits.
coverage_static.restoration_benefit: 100% restoration of SI for unrelated illness/accident after first claim (Enhanced). Unlimited restoration (Premiere). Essential: No restoration.
coverage_static.ambulance_coverage: Road ambulance: As per actuals (network hospital) / up to ₹5,000 per hospitalization (non-network)
coverage_static.health_checkups: Annual health check-up once per year
coverage_static.maternity_coverage: Available as add-on after 24-month waiting period
coverage_static.opd_coverage: Chronic Management Program covers OPD for Diabetes, Hypertension, Asthma, Cholesterol from Day 1. Additional OPD add-on available.
coverage_static.mental_illness_coverage: Covered for hospitalization. Not limited to clinically significant conditions.
coverage_static.bariatric_surgery: Covered if medically necessary (min age 18, prior approval required)

waiting_periods.chronic_management_program: Day 1 coverage for OPD expenses related to Asthma, Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Diabetes (medicines, diagnostics, consultations)
waiting_periods.notes: Unique Chronic Management Program provides Day 1 OPD coverage for lifestyle diseases - unmatched in industry. But full hospitalization for PEDs still requires 36-month wait. Premium waiver for 1 year if diagnosed with listed critical illness.

exclusions: War, riot, strike, nuclear weapon related
key_features: HealthReturns™ - earn up to 100% of premium back for staying healthy/active
Chronic Management Program - Day 1 OPD for lifestyle diseases
Premium Waiver - 1 year premium waived on critical illness diagnosis
Recovery Benefit - ₹10,000 fixed payout on discharge (once/policy year)
Expert Wellness Coach (nutritional, medical, mental counseling)
Fitness rewards via Activ Fit app

shortest_ped_waiting.note: Star Health Comprehensive and Super Star offer 12-month PED via buyback add-on. ICICI Elevate JumpStart reduces lifestyle disease PED to 30 days.

best_day1_chronic_coverage.feature: Chronic Management Program covers OPD expenses from Day 1 for Diabetes, Hypertension, Asthma, Cholesterol

best_restoration_benefit.feature: ReAssure Forever - unlimited reinstatement of base SI after first paid claim, stays for life of policy

best_instant_coverage_increase.feature: 2X cover from Day 1 via Secure Benefit; 4X total in 2 years

best_wellness_rewards.winner: Aditya Birla (HealthReturns™ up to 100%) and Care Supreme (30% renewal discount)
best_wellness_rewards.feature: Both reward healthy behavior with premium savings

largest_network.note: Star Health has 14,000+ and Aditya Birla has 15,000+

highest_csr_irdai.note: All standalone health insurers showed 100% claims settled within 3 months in FY 2024-25 per IRDAI. Among general insurers, HDFC ERGO at 98.85% and ICICI Lombard at 98.45%.

most_affordable.note: Generally offers the lowest premiums for comparable coverage. Starting at ₹17/day as per Care Health website.

longest_ped_waiting_caution.note: 48 months (4 years) is the longest PED waiting among the 6 insurers analyzed. Use Instant Cover or PED modification add-ons.
